system.description:
Time: 15−RSI seconds+Ritual: Chant
Range: Self/Touch+Duration: RSI hours

Permits the subject to detect a Shadow of Bukrai and enter it with no penalty or risk for Duration. Inside the Shadow, the invoker’s body is semi-translucent and his bones are faintly visible where not obscured by clothing. The ritual is used to protect living clergy from the Shadow during ceremonies attended by Amorvrin, etc.
